entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
